ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Zone size on the Moon? RoK big or SoL size?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, they sure are NOT introducing horses to help cut down on travel time, they ve already said that. In a recent chat, Verant said that the Horse s will have
ygData.messageBody:
Well, they sure are NOT introducing horses to help cut down on travel time,
they've already said that. In a recent chat, Verant said that the Horse's
will have the approximate speed of J-Boots / T-Boots. If they were bring
horses on to help with travel times, a horse would be faster because if the
horses are going to be in the 15,000 platinum range if you can buy T-Boots
for 5,250 platinum? The real reason they are introducing horses is because
Verant has always wanted horses and they think the horses they've created
look GREAT. The horses are just for the coolness factor.

-----Original Message-----
From: Thomas [SMTP:Fuzhead@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 07, 2001 1:26 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Zone size on the Moon? RoK big or SoL
size?

I have heard that the zones are going to be huge like Western
Karana, after
all why else would they introduce horses?

You wrote:
> Your note gets me wondering something, has anyone seen or heard
what the
> zone sizes will be for SoL? I remember how bad I hated the new
zones when
> RoK came out. Oh so big, but then with SoV they seemed to scale
them
smaller
> than RoK, but larger than the first ever zones in Everquest. I
sure hope
the
> Moon has about the same size zones as Great Divide, I think that
is about
> the perfect size zone. So has anyone heard?
>
